trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> 類型公開至 UI 自動化。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FrameworkContentElementAutomationPeer" />.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FrameworkContentElementAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FrameworkContentElementAutomationPeer" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the string that uniquely identifies the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得字串，這個字串會唯一識別與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> 相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />。
這個方法是由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationId" /> 所呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The string that uniquely identifies the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" />.

Gets the string that describes the functionality of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得字串，這個字串會描述與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> 關聯之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> 的功能。
這個方法是由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHelpText" /> 所呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The string describing the functionality of the element.
This string typically returns the same text that is provided in the tooltip for the control.
trans-unit.target: 這個字串通常會傳回相同的文字所提供的工具提示控制項中。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Label" /> that is targeted to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FrameworkContentElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Label" />，前者會將目標設定為與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> 相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FrameworkContentElementAutomationPeer" />。
這個方法是由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy" /> 所呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer" /> for the element that is targeted by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Label" />.
trans-unit.target: 項目的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer" /> 為<see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Label" /> 的目標。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the element is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy%2A> method can retrieve the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> that is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果項目，則<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>控制項，<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy%2A>方法可以擷取<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer>如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>相關聯<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>。
